mapper.insert: insert into player_commanders (owner_id, commander_id, level, exp, power, skill_info, talent_info, marching_info, hurt_times, recover_time) values (#{ownerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commanderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{exp,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{power,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{skillInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR,javaType=SkillInfo}, #{talentInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR,javaType=TelentInfo}, #{marchingInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hurtTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{recoverTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select owner_id, commander_id, level, exp, power, skill_info, talent_info, marching_info, hurt_times, recover_time from player_commanders
